item.text: Welcome to this [[Federated Wiki]] site. From this page you can find who we are and what we do. New sites provide this information and then claim the site as their own. You will need your own site to participate.

item.prompt:
Link to a page about yourself here. Type your name enclosed in double square brackets. Then press Command/ALT-S to save.

Make all pages here yours alone with the login below.

item.text: Pages where we do and share.

item.prompt: Create pages about things you do on this wiki. Type a descriptive name of something you will be writing about. Enclose it in square brackets. Then press Command/ALT-S to save.

item.text: You can edit your copy of these pages. Press [+] to add more writing spaces. Read [[How to Wiki]] for more ideas. Follow [[Recent Changes]] here and nearby.

Welcome to this site about [[Data]] in the [[Federated Wiki]] platform. We organise this information and learning in the [[Decentralised Data Academy]]. Follow [[Recent Changes]] to find out what we are [[Currently Working On]].

item.prompt:
Link to a page about yourself here. Type your name enclosed in double square brackets. Then press Command/ALT-S to save.

Make all pages here yours alone with the login below.
item.text: I am a founder of the [[Viral Academy]], where I teach a number of [http://david.viral.academy/view/welcome-visitors/view/david-bovill/view/courses Courses].
item.title: David Bovill

item.prompt: Create pages about things you do on this wiki. Type a descriptive name of something you will be writing about. Enclose it in square brackets. Then press Command/ALT-S to save.
item.text: [[Data]] is structured in a unique way in [[Federated Wiki]]. Here we explore how we can structure things so that everyone owns their own data, and yet we can aggregate and process data across the network in flexible ways.
item.title: Decentralised Data Academy

item.text: The [[Distributed Academy]] aims to create a decentralised [[Network of Learning Spaces]] for [[Flipped Classroom]]s and [[Hyperlocal MOOC]]s
item.title: Distributed Academy

item.text: The Federated Wiki Academy is a place to learn about and join in the development of the [[Federated Wiki Software]].
item.title: Federated Wiki Academy
